price: O, Allah hakkında yalan mı uyduruyor yoksa deliliği mi var? Hayır! Ahirete iman etmeyenler azap ve derin bir sapıklık içindedirler.
arabic: أَفۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا أَم بِهِۦ جِنَّةُۢۗ بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ فِي ٱلۡعَذَابِ وَٱلضَّلَٰلِ ٱلۡبَعِيدِ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: aftarā ʿalā al-lahi kadhiban am bihi jinnatun bali alladhīna lā yu'minūna bil-ākhirati fī al-ʿadhābi wal-ḍalāli al-baʿīdi
